attributes.action: Allow all vaccinated People entry into the UK without quarantine.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government should allow EU vaccine passports immediately so that non-UK residents do not need to quarantine when entering the UK.
attributes.background: Allow all fully vaccinated people entry into the UK without the need to quarantine. Many countries use the same vaccines that are approved in the UK. Anyone from an amber category country that has had an approved vaccine should be allowed quarantine-free entry into the UK.
